inscription: {Miro hito to/ hakobu nioi to/ sode surite/ ume ga Kamata wa/ hana ni nigiwau}

medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Record of a Journey to Enoshima (Enoshima kikō 江島記行)
title: Kamata
